name: server-inspection-system-api
description: サーバー点検システムのバックエンドAPI

scripts.db:setup: npm run db:create && npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.db:setup:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run migrate && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run seed
scripts.db:setup:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run migrate && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run seed
scripts.db:setup:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run migrate && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run seed
